text: Johnathan Carlos Pereira Souza (born 4 April 1995), or simply Johnathan, is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a defender for Bulgarian First League club Botev Plovdiv. ==Career== Johnathan is a product of the Goiás youth sportive system. After that, he played for some Brazilian football clubs, until in February 2018 signed a two and half years contract with the Ukrainian Premier League club Stal Kamianske. He joined Bulgarian club Botev Plovdiv in August 2018. ==References== ==External links== *Profile at Soccerway *Profile at Zerozero Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Goiânia Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Goiás Esporte Clube players Category:Tupi Football Club players Category:FC Stal Kamianske players Category:PFC Botev Plovdiv players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:Expatriate footballers in Ukraine Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Ukraine Category:Expatriate footballers in Bulgaria Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Bulgaria Category:Association football defenders
title: Johnathan Carlos Pereira
